thread.title: People Are Really Pissed At Coca-Cola For Their ‘America Is Beautiful’ Super Bowl Commercial
thread.title_full: People Are Really Pissed At Coca-Cola For Their ‘America Is Beautiful’ Super Bowl Commercial

author: Jorge Alonso
title: People Are Really Pissed At Coca-Cola For Their ‘America Is Beautiful’ Super Bowl Commercial
text:
Shortly before today’s Super Bowl kickoff, Coca-Cola ran an ad with “America the beautiful’ being sung in several different languages by people of different nationalities. Although the commercial is years old, the main reason it’s re-airing is because of Donald Trump’s stance on immigration during the past few months.
Today millions cheer together, because together is beautiful. #AmericaIsBeautiful pic.twitter.com/z65LimssjD 
— Coca-Cola (@CocaCola) February 5, 2017 

Of course Trump supporters were fucking livid. 
Coca Cola taking shots at Trump
— Rev. Eric Dunn (@ericvdunn) February 5, 2017 
@CocaCola was a disgraceful commercial. #BoycottCocaCola 
— John Rivera™ (@JohnRivera316) February 5, 2017 
#Coke Quit shoving Muslims down our throats (Coke CEO is one, right?). Ask them to speak against Islamists, why don't you?
— Jackhammer(( )) (@TheJackOBrien) February 5, 2017 


Fuck you #Coke for that political jab commercial. No more #Coke for me and the same for #PEPSI if the #HalfTimeShow goes political. Bastards
— American Army Vet (@webdawg72) February 5, 2017 
Dear @CocaCola , the bible is in English, Jesus spoke English, America The Beautiful should only be sang in English. #Coke #America 
— Jeremy Scheuch (@jeremyscheuch) February 5, 2017 


Haha, I just dumped out my #Coke and am looking for a new mixer for my @JackDaniels_US yep just found my daughters lemonade! That's America
— BorderWallBuildingCo (@icapturpix) February 5, 2017 
Don't be fooled. #Coke would air a commercial grilling cute puppies if they thought it would sell their product. #SB51 
— Jake Jacobson (@JakeHalfDone) February 5, 2017 


Nothing says "American" like a woman forced to wear a headscarf because a 7th century cult demands "modesty". #Coke 
— Pepe's Imam (@dindunuffinyt) February 5, 2017
